entities.name: gaunts
entities.description: The Gaunts are mentioned as the previous owners of the abandoned home where Harry found the Horcrux. The text states that the Hallow was buried in their home.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character who finds the Horcrux and puts it on without realizing its curse.

relationships.description: The Gaunts owned the abandoned home where Harry found the Horcrux. The text states that the Hallow was buried in their home.
